Replace.Text: Cumulatively get [ICON_SCIENCE][ICON_CULTURE][ICON_GOLD][ICON_FOOD][ICON_PRODUCTION][ICON_FAITH] all output from world bubble

Click the left button to convert the consumption of "Creation"/"Death" equal to the current era into another opposite power, and click the right button to refresh the activation status of the current power and the number of "Growth" and "Death" held

The grotesque world bubble is the sea of ​​quantum +20%[ICON_SCIENCE][ICON_CULTURE][ICON_GOLD][ICON_FOOD][ICON_PRODUCTION][ICON_FAITH]Full output[NewLine] After entering the new era, for each surviving mainstream civilization, it is Sea of ​​Quantum +2%[ICON_SCIENCE][ICON_CULTURE][ICON_GOLD][ICON_FOOD][ICON_PRODUCTION][ICON_FAITH]Full output[NewLine] After entering the new era, every mainstream civilization that is destroyed is called Sea of ​​Quantum- 2% [ICON_SCIENCE][ICON_CULTURE][ICON_GOLD][ICON_FOOD][ICON_PRODUCTION][ICON_FAITH] full output; and +5% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity for the production of drifters; after a large number of mainstream civilizations have been destroyed, unlock drifters, Shi Yu Qi Luo, Nicholas

Xier Fleur has two powers, "Creation" and "Withering", which are rotated at the beginning of the round and forced to consume "Creation"/"Withering" equal to the sequence of the era, so that all friendly units recover 10 HP/ Consumes 5 HP to gain 1 EXP. [NewLine] During the settlement of Ripples in the Dirac Sea, additional "Creation"/"Death" will be obtained according to the number of living/destroyed civilizations. [NewLine][NewLine] When any civilization produces a unit, it will get 1 "Creation", if it is a unit produced by Sile Fleur, it will get 2 "Creation"; when producing a civilian unit, if it has at least 7 * era coefficient " "Creation", consume 7*Era Coefficient's "Creation" to get an additional civilian unit; after Xier Fleur's unit is killed, if it has at least 7*Era Coefficient's "Creation", consume The "Creation" with a factor of 7*Era gets a copy of the unit in place, and at the same time turns the surrounding land into a rainforest. [NewLine][NewLine] When any unit dies, it will get 1 "wither", if the unit of Sile Fleur dies, it will get 2 "wither"; when producing non-civilian units, if it has at least 7 * era coefficient ", then the "Wither" that consumes 7*Era Coefficient will get an additional non-civilian unit; after Xier Fleur's unit is killed once, if it has at least 7*Era Coefficient "Wither", it will consume 7* The "withering" factor of the era causes 25 damage to surrounding enemy units and restores 25 HP, and at the same time turns the surrounding land into desert.
A drifter in the Quantum Sea has no home to return to and no heart to rely on.
A drifter in the Quantum Sea has no home to return to and no heart to rely on.

"I found you, Seele." [NewLine] "You found me, Seele."
After the ice turns into water [NewLine] The sea I hang upside down will become your sky
Wanderer: If you step on non-own territory after moving, you can reset your movement power once a round; you can draw power from the destroyed world bubble
Son of Chaos Brown Sugar: Attacks can knock back enemies, gain 25 health recovery from combat and have 150% loot output.

Floating Sun Prominence Crystal Candy: It can obtain [ICON_CULTURE] culture value of 50% of its combat power from the defeated unit, has 50% extra damage, and switches to sniper rifle mode after a battle.
Floating Prominence Star River Dance: +10[ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength, +2 Vision, +2[ICON_RANGED] Range, -2[ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement
Drifter: +3[ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength, +1[ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement Strength, +2[ICON_MOVEMENT] Ocean Movement Strength

Drifter: You can get the [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, [ICON_CULTURE] culture value, [ICON_GOLD] gold coin, [ICON_FAITH] faith value of 25% [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power of the killed unit from the battle

Drifter: Can acquire 3 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power from every point of unused [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement power. At the end of the round, 10 health points will be restored. Stepping on one's own territory after moving will also reset the movement power and restore an additional 25 health points
Drifter: Can obtain 3 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power from surrounding promoted units, and can ignore the loss of [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement power of the land

Drifter: +1 number of attacks, +1 [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement power, +2 [ICON_MOVEMENT] ocean movement power, can still move after attacking, can still attack after moving, will not reduce [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power due to damage
It is actually brown sugar of the Hugs family, and it appears as Shabu Nicholas when it mimics a human.
The drifter of Quantum Sea, Crystal Sugar, a non-staff member of the Hugs family, is good at using double guns and sniper rifles
A wanderer who lost his original homeland, carrying the last fire of civilization, +1 [ICON_CULTURE] culture value, +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value
Floating Prominence Star River Dance: +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Power
Drifter: Gain 3 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength per point of unused [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement
Drifter: can obtain 3 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power from surrounding promoted units
